events.message: I received the wrong size for my recent order and would like to request a refund because the item does not fit and I do not want to exchange it.
The reported issue has been classified under the Refund cluster as the customer is requesting their money back due to the incorrect size received.
A customer service agent has been assigned to address the refund request related to the incorrect size received by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the item in the wrong size. Could you please confirm the order number for verification?
To process your refund promptly, could you please provide a photo of the received item showing the size label and the packing slip from the shipment?
Here is the photo of the shirt I got, and you can see the size label clearly shows it’s a medium, but I ordered large. I also attached the packing slip as requested.
Thank you for providing the photos. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days. Please keep the item; no need to return it.
Thanks for the quick resolution and for letting me keep the shirt. I appreciate the excellent customer service and prompt attention to my refund request.
The refund process has been completed and confirmed. The customer’s payment will be credited shortly. Thank you for your patience during this process.
We’re following up to ensure you have received your refund successfully. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As the refund has been confirmed and the customer is satisfied, we have now closed this support case. Thank you for contacting customer service.
